list.name: Changes
list.comment: Add `DirectTest` for `Compiler`: validate function declaration with `I16` return type. Enhance `Compiler` and `FunctionDeclarationValidator` to handle function declarations with `return` statements.

task.summary: Default task

changelist.name: Changes
changelist.comment: Delete everything! This is a hard reset!

task.summary: Extend `FunctionHelper` to map return types. Add tests for functions with explicit return types in `FunctionTest`.

Add `FunctionParts` and `Parameter` classes to modularize function parsing in `FunctionHelper`. Extend `FunctionTest` with additional parameterized function tests and function call validation. Update `Compiler` to handle function calls.
Update `FunctionTest` with tests for multiple functions, parameters, and return types. Adjust workspace settings for improved debugging.
Add support for inner function extraction and compilation. Update `FunctionHelper` to handle nested functions and adjust `FunctionTest` with comprehensive inner function tests.
Refactor `FunctionHelper` to enhance inner function extraction. Introduce `InnerFunctionsResult` record and modularize related utilities into `CodeUtils`.
Extract `FunctionPositions` to a dedicated class in `magma.node` for improved modularity. Update references in `CodeUtils` and `FunctionHelper`. Adjust workspace XML formatting.
Add `StructImplHelper` to process struct implementation blocks and methods. Extend `StructTest` with cases for structs with single and multiple methods.
Update `StructTest` to ensure semicolon handling in struct declarations and improve validation for structs with methods and implementations.

Add `StructRobustnessTest` to validate edge cases, syntax errors, and method handling for structs. Expand `StructTest` with robustness scenarios and ensure consistent semicolon usage in struct declarations.
Add `ClassFunctionHelper` to handle "class fn" syntax sugar. Introduce `ClassFunctionTest` for validation and edge cases. Update `TypeHelper` to support `String` types.
Remove `isClassFunction` method from `ClassFunctionHelper` as it is unused and redundant.

Introduce generic struct support by adding `GenericTypeHelper` for type parameter handling. Extend `StructHelper`, `StructInitializationHelper`, and `TypeHelper` for concrete type creation and validation. Add `MonomorphicStructTest` for testing generic struct functionality.
Add tests for generic struct handling, including direct, debug, and declaration cases. Extend `StructHelper` and related classes to support and validate generic struct initializations.
Refactor generic struct test suite: replace `DirectGenericStructTest` with `MinimalStructTest`, expand `GenericStructDebugTest`, and enhance struct initialization validation logic.
Update Checkstyle and guidelines: restrict cyclomatic complexity, limit method parameters, and enforce code readability rules.
Update guidelines: emphasize documentation practices, clarify debugging approach, and refine formatting rules.
Add JavaScript `let` to C `int32_t` conversion in `StringUtils.echo` and corresponding tests.
Add test for JavaScript `let` to C `int32_t` conversion with `test` variable. Update guidelines to prefer modifying old code over writing new code.
Enhance `StringUtils.echo` to support TypeScript-style variable declarations. Refactor to non-static implementation and add corresponding tests.
Refactor `StringUtils` to `Compiler`: rename class and methods, enhance TypeScript variable handling, and update tests accordingly.
Refactor `StringUtils` to `Compiler`: improve TypeScript variable handling, introduce type mapping logic, and expand test coverage with parameterized tests.
Introduce `CompileException` and enhance `Compiler` for type safety: add type compatibility checks, throw exceptions for mismatches, and expand test coverage.
Extract `VariableDeclaration` and `DeclarationContext` into standalone records for better modularity and reusability.
Support variable references in `Compiler`: handle multiple declarations and add corresponding test case. Update guidelines.

Add support for type compatibility checks in variable references within `Compiler`. Introduce `TypeCheckParams` and `TypeScriptAnnotationParams` records to improve method signatures. Expand `CompilerTest` with new cases for variable reference handling and type mismatch validation.

Modularize `Compiler` by introducing `TypeMapper`, `ValueProcessor`, and `DeclarationProcessor` for type mapping, value handling, and declaration processing. Centralize dependencies in `DeclarationConfig` and adjust tests for improved composition. Update `README` with architecture details.

Add support for mutable and immutable variable handling in `Compiler`. Track and validate variable mutability, enforce reassignment rules, and expand `DeclarationProcessor` and `DeclarationContext` accordingly. Update tests with cases for mutability logic.
Add Bool type support in `Compiler`, extend `ValueProcessor` for boolean literal handling, update `TypeMapper` for Bool mapping, and enhance tests with Bool-related cases.

Add support for type-checked addition operations in `Compiler`: validate operand types during addition and throw `CompileException` for mismatches. Extend tests with cases for valid and invalid additions.

Add support for type-checked boolean operations in `Compiler`: validate operand types for logical OR (`||`) and AND (`&&`), throw `CompileException` for non-Bool types, and expand tests with valid and invalid cases.

Add chained addition support in `Compiler`: allow multiple operands of the same type in addition operations. Validate types and throw `CompileException` for mismatches. Extend tests with valid and invalid chained cases.

Add tests for nested arithmetic and boolean expressions in `Compiler`: validate type-compatibility and parenthesized operations. Expand test coverage for deeply nested, mixed operator, and variable reference cases.
Fix broken `@DisplayName` annotation in `ArithmeticNestedExpressionsTest`

Add tests for comparison operators in `Compiler`: validate type compatibility for equality (`==`, `!=`) and relational (`<`, `>`, `<=`, `>=`) operations. Include tests for valid and invalid cases with numeric and boolean types.
Condense inline `if` statements across multiple classes for improved readability and consistency.
Adjust packaging

Add `IfStatement` support in `Compiler`: introduce validation, extraction, and type-checking logic for `if` statements. Add unit tests to verify syntax, boolean condition validation, and body processing.
Expand `IfStatement` support: add validation and processing for `if-else` statements, including brace enforcement and body handling. Update tests to cover `if-else` syntax and validation scenarios.

Add `WhileStatement` support in `Compiler`: introduce validation, extraction, and type-checking logic for `while` statements. Add unit tests to verify syntax, boolean condition validation, structure enforcement, and body processing.
Add validation for invalid inputs in `Compiler`: throw `CompileException` for unsupported text inputs. Update tests to verify invalid cases.

Add `StructDeclaration` support in `Compiler`: implement validation, processing, and conversion to C syntax. Introduce `StructDeclarationParams` and `StructDeclarationValidator` for modular validation. Add unit tests to verify struct syntax and semantics.
Add tests for arithmetic operations in `Compiler`: validate nested expressions and cover edge cases for addition, subtraction, multiplication, and mixed-type expressions.
Add tests for `F32` and `F64` declarations and inference: validate syntax, type suffixes, mutability, references, and type compatibility.
Refactor and reorganize packages; remove unused `IfStatementDebug`. Update imports and adjust paths for improved modularity and structure.

Add function declaration support to `Compiler`: introduce `FunctionDeclarationValidator` for syntax validation and processing. Add unit tests to verify function declarations, including return types, body content, and identifiers.

Add function declaration support to `Compiler`: introduce `FunctionDeclarationValidator` for syntax validation and processing. Add unit tests to verify function declarations, including return types, body content, and identifiers.
Add `DirectTest` for `Compiler`: validate function declaration with `I16` return type. Enhance `Compiler` and `FunctionDeclarationValidator` to handle function declarations with `return` statements.

MESSAGE.value: Introduce variable type tracking in `Compiler`: map variable types, validate references, and enhance test coverage.

Add support for type compatibility checks in variable references within `Compiler`. Introduce `TypeCheckParams` and `TypeScriptAnnotationParams` records to improve method signatures. Expand `CompilerTest` with new cases for variable reference handling and type mismatch validation.

Modularize `Compiler` by introducing `TypeMapper`, `ValueProcessor`, and `DeclarationProcessor` for type mapping, value handling, and declaration processing. Centralize dependencies in `DeclarationConfig` and adjust tests for improved composition. Update `README` with architecture details.

Add support for mutable and immutable variable handling in `Compiler`. Track and validate variable mutability, enforce reassignment rules, and expand `DeclarationProcessor` and `DeclarationContext` accordingly. Update tests with cases for mutability logic.
Add Bool type support in `Compiler`, extend `ValueProcessor` for boolean literal handling, update `TypeMapper` for Bool mapping, and enhance tests with Bool-related cases.

Add support for type-checked addition operations in `Compiler`: validate operand types during addition and throw `CompileException` for mismatches. Extend tests with cases for valid and invalid additions.

Add support for type-checked boolean operations in `Compiler`: validate operand types for logical OR (`||`) and AND (`&&`), throw `CompileException` for non-Bool types, and expand tests with valid and invalid cases.

Add chained addition support in `Compiler`: allow multiple operands of the same type in addition operations. Validate types and throw `CompileException` for mismatches. Extend tests with valid and invalid chained cases.

Add support for type-checked arithmetic operations in `Compiler`: enable addition, subtraction, and multiplication with type validation. Throw `CompileException` for type mismatches. Expand tests with cases for valid, invalid, and parenthesized expressions.

Add tests for nested arithmetic and boolean expressions in `Compiler`: validate type-compatibility and parenthesized operations. Expand test coverage for deeply nested, mixed operator, and variable reference cases.
Fix broken `@DisplayName` annotation in `ArithmeticNestedExpressionsTest`

Add tests for comparison operators in `Compiler`: validate type compatibility for equality (`==`, `!=`) and relational (`<`, `>`, `<=`, `>=`) operations. Include tests for valid and invalid cases with numeric and boolean types.
Condense inline `if` statements across multiple classes for improved readability and consistency.
Adjust packaging

Add `IfStatement` support in `Compiler`: introduce validation, extraction, and type-checking logic for `if` statements. Add unit tests to verify syntax, boolean condition validation, and body processing.

Add if-else support to `IfStatementValidator`: extend validation, extraction, and type-checking logic to handle if-else syntax. Update associated parameters and unit tests to verify conditions, body processing, and structure validation.
Expand `IfStatement` support: add validation and processing for `if-else` statements, including brace enforcement and body handling. Update tests to cover `if-else` syntax and validation scenarios.

Add `WhileStatement` support in `Compiler`: introduce validation, extraction, and type-checking logic for `while` statements. Add unit tests to verify syntax, boolean condition validation, structure enforcement, and body processing.
Add validation for invalid inputs in `Compiler`: throw `CompileException` for unsupported text inputs. Update tests to verify invalid cases.

Add `StructDeclaration` support in `Compiler`: implement validation, processing, and conversion to C syntax. Introduce `StructDeclarationParams` and `StructDeclarationValidator` for modular validation. Add unit tests to verify struct syntax and semantics.
Add tests for arithmetic operations in `Compiler`: validate nested expressions and cover edge cases for addition, subtraction, multiplication, and mixed-type expressions.
Add tests for `F32` and `F64` declarations and inference: validate syntax, type suffixes, mutability, references, and type compatibility.
Refactor and reorganize packages; remove unused `IfStatementDebug`. Update imports and adjust paths for improved modularity and structure.

Add function declaration support to `Compiler`: introduce `FunctionDeclarationValidator` for syntax validation and processing. Add unit tests to verify function declarations, including return types, body content, and identifiers.
Add `DirectTest` for `Compiler`: validate function declaration with `I16` return type. Enhance `Compiler` and `FunctionDeclarationValidator` to handle function declarations with `return` statements.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Add `DirectTest` for `Compiler`: validate function declaration with `I16` return type. Enhance `Compiler` and `FunctionDeclarationValidator` to handle function declarations with `return` statements.
